prog: (Sage) BB = primes_first_n(14) list = [] for i in range(13): list.append(factorial(BB[i])) list # _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 14 2007(PARI) a(n)=prime(n)! \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 07 2012(MAGMA) [Factorial(NthPrime(n)): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 21 2014
